commit message: Remove unreachable code, nullify mErrorMsg, Replace HttpClient/Channels by HttpUrlConnection (faster and better supported)
Add error title from Exception class
Separate api and dir errors... kind of dirty but...
Accept all SSL certificates (Good to test on emulator)
setTheme before super.onCreate() for Android 1.5 to correctly handle theme, remove theme override
Move setTheme and super.onCreate before anything or it breaks on 1.5... Annoying bug: #3793
Use light theme for widget selection as Dialog theme is fucked up on Android 4.0
Better loading dialog (kept until everything is loaded but the image)
Sized buffer, add icon for Android 1.5
Add interval setTimer for try again, add comment...
Retry when unknown host exception occurs
Linkify adresses to search on gmaps (even if it wasnt autodetected by autoLink, catch dialog error and use remove instead of dismiss (no caching)
comment stuff, more general exception catching
Cam and stream support, SSLHandshakeException catching
padding at the end of the main list
